text: And btw secretly I think the reason the Supreme Court passed that crazy abortion ruling is that they resent people who had good sex when they were younger. Hey people of my age were all of us horribly repressed because we were raised by people who were raised by crazy people. Of course today's young folk were raised by crazy people too, so I've never bought the idea that they're so much more evolved. I think that's (to quote my mentor NakedJen) bullshit. :smile:
